reviews.name: Lenovo Legion 5 (2024)
reviews.performance_summary: Smooth multitasking, great for video editing and gaming. Averaged 80-100 FPS in AAA titles at high settings.
reviews.battery_life: 6-7 hours on mixed usage, 3-4 hours under heavy load.
reviews.display_quality: FHD 165Hz IPS with 100% sRGB color accuracy. Excellent for creators.
reviews.final_verdict: If you need a laptop under $1200 for creative work and gaming, the Legion 5 2024 is an outstanding choice.

reviews.name: ASUS Zenbook 14X OLED (2024)
reviews.performance_summary: Exceptional display for creative work, fast performance for everyday tasks and multitasking. Not meant for heavy gaming.
reviews.battery_life: 8-9 hours on balanced use. 6 hours with heavy video editing.
reviews.display_quality: 2.8K OLED with rich contrast and 100% DCI-P3 ‚Äî top-tier visuals.
cons: Can heat up under video editing load
reviews.final_verdict: Ideal for digital nomads, creators and productivity-focused users who prioritize display quality and portability.

reviews.name: Acer Nitro 5 (2023)
reviews.performance_summary: Great entry-level gaming laptop that also handles content creation and multitasking without lag.
reviews.battery_life: 4-5 hours on casual use, 2-3 hours gaming.
reviews.display_quality: FHD 144Hz IPS display, decent color accuracy (72% NTSC).
reviews.final_verdict: A solid pick for entry-level gamers and creators on a tight budget.

accessories.name: Logitech MX Master 3S
accessories.description: One of the best productivity mice with ultra-precise scrolling, multiple device connection and long battery life.

accessories.name: Anker 7-in-1 USB-C Hub
accessories.description: Expand your laptop's connectivity with HDMI, SD card, and multiple USB ports.

accessories.name: JBL Quantum 200 Headset
accessories.description: Comfortable wired headset with powerful sound for gaming, calls, and video editing.
